title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. VI, subch. F, pt. 686 - Contracts Or Agreements For The Construction, Improvement, Extension Or Maintenance Of Utility Plants
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. VI, subch. F, pt. 686

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16 [1], 20[1], 115

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
